climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: HYDRATING FACE WASH Restore your face to its natural state of moisture & suppleness while cleansing & removing makeup. Gently cleanses without dehydrating or leaving skin feeling tight. Contains skin restoring ingredients safe for use in eye area

Paula's Choice RESIST Optimal Results Hydrating Facial Cleanser replenishes moisture and helps to preserve skin's healthy barrier while effectively cleansing skin. The result? Visibly smoother hydrated softer and younger-looking skin with each use!

Use RESIST Optimal Results Hydrating Facial Cleanser twice daily as part of your morning and evening skin care routines along with your favorite Paula's Choice toner, exfoliator, serums, spot treatments, and moisturizer with SPF for daytime wear.

Paula's Choice products are made with YOUR SKIN in mind. Whatever your skincare concern, whether dryness, acne, fine lines, or sensitive skin; we've got a treatment line for you. The search for amazing skin care ends here. Finally, you found it.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, science-backed formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and effective
reviews.reviewText: My favourite cleanser. I use it in the morning and after a makeup removing balm at night. It works well, is non-irritating, doesn't break me out, and leaves my dry skin hydrated. I have occasionally used it without a separate makeup removing cleanser to remove sunscreen and makeup and it does an okay job if I do it twice, but it's not ideal for the task.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Great for Sensitive Skin!! Not Drying at all!!
reviews.reviewText: If you've read my other skincare reviews, you know all about my terribly sensitive, angry, redness and eczema-prone skin. I have reacted to all sorts of products that are "approved for sensitive skin," and I have only found a select few products where my skin does not flare like a New Year's Eve sparkler. This is one of those products!!!!I double cleanse in the evening- I use this as my cream cleanser now and I will keep purchasing! :) The oil cleanser I use is from Laneige, and you can see I wrote a review on this product as well. I use the two of them together and my skin stays calm.I love this cleanser, not just because my skin approves it, but also because it is not drying!!! It effectively cleanses your skin without feeling like you applied an astringent to your face afterwards. It is super gentle yet effective at cleansing. I think this cleanser could be used for any skin type- definitely dry, sensitive skin approved!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this cleanser! It leaves my skin clean and feeling so soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't remove all my makeup
reviews.reviewText: I like the feel of this in my skin it's very silky but my eyes have raccoon circles around them from my makeup after washing. It doesn't remove all my eye makeup and I don't even really wear that much makeup. My skin feels hydrated after use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how thick and rich this cleanser feels! It’s such a simple pleasure and makes my skin feelSoft and nourished. I like to wash my face with this and then leave it on for a bit just to get the full moisturizing benefits. This has the consistency of a thick and moisturizing cleanser and is similar to a lotion type consistency so it’s great for dry skin- which my skin can get dry because of the dry harsh winters here and this really prevents it from getting dry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Checks all the boxes
reviews.reviewText: As pure as you can get, cleansing, hydrating and really good value for the price.I have mature skin and its perfect for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the cleaner but it does sting my face. I guess I have sensitive skin toward this one. Otherwise it’s a good choice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good every tip of skin
reviews.reviewText: Very good face wash very hydrating and makes your skin feel like silk

Super nettoyant Paula choice semblable à un lait , texture crème, ne mousse pas, enveloppant et efficace. La peau est douce, hydratée prête à recevoir les soins. Léger parfum qui s’estompe très vite heureusement car je n’en suis pas fan . Voilà la seule remarque , le seul reproche si on peut dire que je n’apprécie pas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 2, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Only used for about 2 weeks now but can see a difference in skin already. Like the textue, not greasy at all and leaves skin soft and replenished. I use it in combination with Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant and pores appear much smaller, skin is much smoother. I am very happy that I found those two products as seem to be transforming my skin. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 6, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I saw this reviewed on you tube and it really is as goodd as they said.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: Best facewash I have ever discovered
reviews.reviewText: Been ordering it monthly for five years, no better face wash in the world. Feels so luxurious putting it on:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 6, 2018
reviews.reviewText: You can't go wrong with this one
